Sentencas: Hydrogen production from renewable energy resources has received significant attention with advances in fuel cell technology.
Titulo: Use of different renewable fuels in a steam reformer integrated into a solid oxide fuel cell: Theoretical analysis and performance comparison

Sentencas: The fuel type and operational reforming conditions directly affect fuel cell electricity generation.
Titulo: Use of different renewable fuels in a steam reformer integrated into a solid oxide fuel cell: Theoretical analysis and performance comparison

Sentencas: This study analyzes the theoretical performance of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) integrated with a steam reforming process using three different renewable fuels: ethanol, glycerol and biogas.
Titulo: Use of different renewable fuels in a steam reformer integrated into a solid oxide fuel cell: Theoretical analysis and performance comparison

Sentencas: The effects of key steam reformer operating parameters on the hydrogen production for SOFCs are investigated.
Titulo: Use of different renewable fuels in a steam reformer integrated into a solid oxide fuel cell: Theoretical analysis and performance comparison

Sentencas: The performances of SOFC systems run on different fuels are compared in terms of electrical and thermal efficiencies.
Titulo: Use of different renewable fuels in a steam reformer integrated into a solid oxide fuel cell: Theoretical analysis and performance comparison

Sentencas: It is found that the biogas-fueled SOFC system requires the most energy, whereas the ethanol-fueled SOFC system achieves the highest electrical and thermal efficiencies.
Titulo: Use of different renewable fuels in a steam reformer integrated into a solid oxide fuel cell: Theoretical analysis and performance comparison
